name: Ascent Solar Technologies, Inc.
description: Ascent Solar Technologies, Inc. is a pioneering manufacturer of solar panels and energy solutions that focus on lightweight, flexible photovoltaic technology. Founded in 2005 and headquartered in Thornton, Colorado, the company specializes in the production of advanced thin-film solar cells, primarily using CIGS (Copper Indium Gallium Selenide) technology. Ascent Solar's innovative approach enables the production of solar panels that are not only highly efficient but also adaptable for a wide range of applications, including portable electronics, building-integrated photovoltaics, and aerospace. The company's products are designed to meet the growing demand for sustainable and renewable energy sources, providing customers with reliable power generation solutions that can be deployed in various environments. Ascent Solar is committed to driving advancements in solar technology, making strides towards a greener future, and contributing to global efforts to reduce carbon emissions. By leveraging its proprietary technologies, Ascent aims to empower industries and consumers alike with affordable and efficient solar energy solutions, ultimately supporting the transition to sustainable energy systems worldwide.
